strIntroduction: What You'll Do Saigon Central Post Office was built by renowned architect Gustave Eiffel. Notre-Dame Cathedral, or Notre-Dame Basilica is a famous old cathedral in Southern Vietnam. Reunification Palace served as the home and office of the South Vietnamese President during the Vietnam War. Ben Thanh Market is a must-see during the day and at sunset.
